headline.print_headline: 2014: A Year of Battle Lines Drawn Over Dinner
headline.main: 2014: A Year of Battle Lines Drawn Over Dinner

docs.lead_paragraph: Have you picked a side yet? If not, you'd better think fast, because the battle lines are being drawn and they cut right down the dinner table.
docs.snippet: Have you picked a side yet? If not, you'd better think fast, because the battle lines are being drawn and they cut right down the dinner table.

headline.print_headline: Obesity Can Be Deemed a Disability at Work: EU Court
headline.main: Obesity Can Be Deemed a Disability at Work: EU Court

docs.lead_paragraph: Europe's top court ruled on Thursday that obese people can be considered as disabled, but stopped short of saying that obesity was a condition that needed specific protection under European anti-discrimination laws.
docs.snippet: Europe's top court ruled on Thursday that obese people can be considered as disabled, but stopped short of saying that obesity was a condition that needed specific protection under European anti-discrimination laws.

headline.print_headline: Safety: Big Belly, Bigger Heart Risk
headline.main: Belly Fat Tied to Sudden Cardiac Death

docs.abstract: Having a “beer belly” significantly increases the risk for sudden cardiac death, a new study has found.
docs.snippet: Having a “beer belly” significantly increases the risk for sudden cardiac death, a new study has found.

headline.print_headline: Study Questions Glycemic Index, and With It the Idea of Good or Bad Carbs
headline.main: Questioning the Idea of Good Carbs, Bad Carbs

docs.abstract: For people who already follow a healthful diet, the glycemic index may not be very important.
docs.snippet: For people who already follow a healthful diet, the glycemic index may not be very important.

headline.print_headline: Qatar: Small Country the Big New Player in Sport
headline.main: Qatar: Small Country the Big New Player in Sport

docs.lead_paragraph: Leaders of Qatar seem to have a simple formula for their plans over the next decade: money + sports = global fame.
docs.snippet: Leaders of Qatar seem to have a simple formula for their plans over the next decade: money + sports = global fame.

headline.print_headline: Senate Approves Obama Pick for Surgeon General
headline.main: Senate Approves Obama Pick for Surgeon General

docs.lead_paragraph: The Senate on Monday approved President Barack Obama's nomination of Dr. Vivek Murthy to serve as U.S. surgeon general, despite opposition from Republicans and some Democrats over his support for gun control and past statements that gun violence is a public health issue.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Google Employees Launch App to Make You Smarter About Health, Fitness
headline.main: Ex-Google Employees Launch App to Make You Smarter About Health, Fitness

docs.lead_paragraph: A group of former Google employees are betting they can boost the world's medical knowledge with a mobile IQ test.
docs.snippet: A group of former Google employees are betting they can boost the world's medical knowledge with a mobile IQ test.
